author: Chris Dick
subject: LD covers for TV specials
body:
hello.

almost finished collecting the entire tv specials...just got "Liberty 
Crisis" from Fansubs2000. I have a question for people. I don't like to do 
covers from scratch, so i'm asking people here if they have high-rez scans 
of the following:

1. Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
2. Liberty Crisis
3. Napolean's Dictionary
4. Dark Order of Assasination
5. Fujiko's Unlucky Days

If anyone can help, i'd be a happy man. And, no, i'm not going to replicate 
the covers and sell them...

Chris
